title: LUX RENOVATED MASSIVE STUDIO PRIVATE BACKYARD ALL AMENITIES!
posting_body: ['Hello there,', 'I have a new to market gorgeous massive studio in a luxury building with elevator, laundry in unit, dishwasher, hardwood floors, on the 1st floor facing south, with central AC and heat units.', 'Completely renovated.', 'Private backyard area $3395 ASAP move in.', 'Location is ideal a block away from Tomkins Square Park.', ' Near all the best Zagat rated restaurants, bars, boutiques, etc.', 'Near the L train and all buses that take you to Gramercy, Kips Bay, West village, Tribeca, Fidi, even Williamsburgh in Brooklyn, Walking distance to Union Square, Lower east side, Greenwich village, Chinatown, Soho Nolita.', 'Massive with separate kitchen', 'Elevator new construction building', 'Brand new luxury renovation', 'Laundry in unit', 'Dishwasher', 'Private backyard', 'Halogen recessed lighting', 'Credit required', 'Unfurnished 1 year lease min.', 'No short term', 'USA guarantors accepted', 'one month broker fee', 'Please call or text for showings and videos!', 'Allie', '718-614-7104']
